snippet: Pentagon workers searching records on another case discovered confidential e-mails between lawyers for a man accused of helping to plot the 2000 bombing of the destroyer Cole in Yemen.
abstract: Problems with defense lawyers’ e-mails and computer files prompts military commission judge to postpone pretrial hearing in death-penalty case of Guantanamo Bay detainee Abd al-Rahim al-Nashiri, accused of helping to plot 2000 bombing of destroyer Cole.
lead_paragraph: Pentagon workers searching records on another case discovered confidential e-mails between lawyers for a man accused of helping to plot the 2000 bombing of the destroyer Cole in Yemen.

headline.seo: E-Mail Security Issue Delays Hearing in U.S.S. Cole Bombing
headline.main: Hearing in Cole Attack Is Delayed Again, This Time by E-mail Security Issue
headline.print_headline: Hearing in Cole Attack Is Delayed Again, This Time by E-Mail Security Issue
